metadata.synopsis: She's saying a prayer to Umberlee before giving the offering. In her one line dialog she suggests she wants to get this over with very quickly and leave, but needs to say her prayers first.

0.speaker: Dilgar Sneese
0.text: Oh mighty Umberlee, hear my prayer!
0.context: NodeContext: Trying to be suitably grand with this prayer

1.speaker: Dilgar Sneese
1.text: You're the unrivalled Queen of the... sea? Surf... waves! Wavemother! Oh, cocks...
1.context: NodeContext: Struggling to remember the words of the prayer/make up a good one

2.speaker: Dilgar Sneese
2.text: Please grant me your blessing - I'm leaving you a nice fat purse I swiped and my favourite belt buckle. Thanks. I mean thank you.
2.context: NodeContext: Bringing her shaky attempt at a prayer home with the important stuff (and trying to end politely despite herself)

3.speaker: Dilgar Sneese
3.text: Oh mighty Wavemother - I implore you for safe passage on my next sea... passage. Uh...
3.context: NodeContext: Struggling to remember the words of the prayer/make up a good one
